item.title: Joining Microsoft
item.description: Over the past five years I’ve been running my own consultancy and software companies. Last year was a period of reflection for both Nightingale HQ and myself. What do we want to be and where should we be spending our time? The answer for Nightingale HQ (NHQ) is a change towards more of a blended product and services offering in the manufacturing space. For me, it’s gaining a stronger foundation in technology leadership.

item.title: Chair
item.description: Chairing the Board to support Nightingale HQ’s growth plans.

item.title: Non-Executive Director
item.description: Supporting the setup of the new SQL Saturday not-for-profit.

item.title: Nightingale HQ
item.description: Nightingale HQ (NHQ) is a startup focused on improving productivity in the manufacturing sector through the use no-code programming, data, and AI.
